info.summary: This is one of the six facets in the B5 Model. It consists the traits such as Altruism & Morality etc
info.general: This facet averages its individual traits and is generally an indication of a person's tendency to be compassionate and cooperative toward others.
info.high: Value getting along with others. They have a more optimistic view of human nature.
info.medium: medium , neutral
info.low: Value self interests over others. They are more skeptical of others' motives.

general.high: Generally, this person is easy going and good in all kinds of relationships, being compassionate to others makes the target a popular person in the social circle. If the person is also physically attractive s/he will be extremely welcome by the opposite sex and as the other half, you may sometimes find yourself jealousy

info.high: Your partner is easy going ... elaborate ... to form a even better relationship.
info.medium: Your partner is neutral in easy going.
info.low: Your partner is not easy going!

info.high: you have an easy going parent, not much control... do not abuse it.. more independent but easily out of control, be matured
You have an easy going child, they get along well with their own friends and don't rely on you too much; still your company; also watch out what kind of friends they hand around.

general.high: This person is easy going and forms good relationship with colleagues, customers or business partners.

info.high: You have an easy going boss.
You have an easy going subordinate.
You have an easy going team mate.
The target is an easy going friend

general.high: She/he feels fulfilled when helping people and is generally considered a helpful person in the business network.
general.medium: From time to time, there can be some inner conflicts between helping you and getting straight to business.
general.low: S/he places own interest beyond anything else, good relationship is not too vital, depends on the role s/he is in, so try to focus on business.

info.high: If your product or service matches other competitors, then telling her/him how desperately you need the order, and the reasons why this order will help your situation could help you to get the deal.
info.medium: S/he may be having some inner conflicts if you did a good job in showing how helpful it'd be to have her/his order. There's always chance that S/he is tempted to place the order as helping you could fulfil her/himself too. Yet if s/he's in the egoism mood, then s/he will be very much focus on business.
info.low: S/he place own interest before anything, so good relationship will not help your sales. In stead, focus on the real sales stuffs: understand what problem is he facing with, what are the paint points, how your products or service can eliminate the paint points or meets his demands, how are you doing compared to your competitors etc.

info.high: S/he may want to get your order very much, but at the meant time, if you feel their genuineness in helping you, that means s/he  truly believe the service and product can help you; if you don't then chance is that s/he her/himself does not think the product or service can help, s/he's purely trying to make a sales.
info.medium:
You usually do not need to care about the relationship unless s/he is a large upstream supplier whose can significantly affect your business if the supply is not steady.

For half of the time s/he feels fulfilled when s/he's able to help you. So exaggerating a little about how important their supply will not hurt.
info.low: S/he place own interest before anything, so will try to push and get your order with little regards to whether you really need the product or service.; if provider..., that need good relationship, try convincing her/him from him/her's perspective. (For example? ...)

Openness.description: Openness to experience. Higher: Intellectually curious, emotionally-aware, sensitive to beauty and willing to try new things.\nLower: Preferring the plain, straightforward, and obvious over the complex, ambiguous, and subtle.

info.high: Try hard to achieve excellence. Their drive to be recognized as successful keeps them on track as they work hard to accomplish their goals.
info.low: Content with the level of accomplishment and do not feel the need to set ambitious goals.

general.high: There's no doubt that this person has high demand on her/himself, the question is whether s/he has similar demand on other people that s/he loves. There are two types of people depends how they view others, and impact to the relationship is very different too.[this is one angle... but... not in partner but in parent! ]
general.medium: For people in the middle range, it can be both a balancing power and source of internal conflict. On one hand they wish to be more successful, on the other hand they're not ambitious enough or simply lack the inner drive; for people who successfully resolve the internal conflicts they'll retain a very good balance. [good but not specific to the view... should be in trait info... yet no scores in that session ... where to put? tt] ?? in terms of love view:...
general.low: S/he's content with her/his pace in life or career. S/he's unlikely to push the ones s/he loves for success, but s/he may still hive high expectation, and s/he could admire the drive that's missing in her/him.

info.high: S/he sets high goal and work hard towards it, when there's conflicts between this and the relationship, someone need to compromise or even sacrifice. If the partner also scores high in this trait, or if both score low in Agreeableness, especially Cooperation and Sympathy, tension is hard to avoid from time to time.
info.medium: Your partner is neutral in easy going.
info.low: Your partner is not easy going!

info.high: If s/he has the same expectation on the child as to him/herself, then s/he should pray the child has the same trait, otherwise tension is unavoidable.
As a child s/he continues to strive for the best inside or outside of school, inside or outside of study. Parents feel proud of the him/her.

general.high: This person has high standard at work, set high goals and work hard to achieve the goals. It's likely that he may have similar expectation on colleagues who may eventually disappoint her/him.

info.high: S/he's a boss who's hard to please.
S/he usually gains high regards and respects from superiors.

S/he gains respect from the team for her/his ability and capability, though may not necessarily a good team player. [dynamic!]since also score high in Altruism s/he's likely to be super popular among the team.[/medium - some popular]/[low - not too popular due to egoism] [but what's the implication? or info only...]

general.high: People scored high in this trait can be further divided to two subtypes: people that have the same trait outside of work and in all aspects in life, these are 'truly' Achievement-striving people, they are usually perfectionist; people that are totally opposite outside of work, they stress themselves enough for work and would like to relax as much as possible outside work.

info.high: The 'truly' type may appear a bit fussy to friends and is generally considered not easy to get along; on contrary the other subtype usually gives friends the impression of easy-going and relaxing.

children.description: The need for personal achievement and sense of direction.

info.high: Disposed to think through possibilities carefully before acting.
info.low: Would rather take action immediately than spend time deliberating making a decision.

general.high: Being cautious and planning s/he is extremely reliable on matters but may also appear lacking enthusiasm or intense emotions. [ make some fun in improvement]
general.low: A bit impulsive and may or may not regret afterwards. If you have similar trait it's very important you keep calm when s/he doesn't.

info.high: You could pass her/him things to handle then relax knowing they'll handle them well. If you are in opposite trait you may sometimes find her/him a little over cautious on everything, [if score low in spontaneousness, wish a little more spontaneously and does not need to plan on everything / lucky score high in ...]
info.medium: S/he sometimes can be torn apart from the two inner forces of impulse to action and caution, you could influence her/him as partner; at other times s/he strikes a good balance between the two.
info.low:
S/he may appear impulsive but usually improves over time when getting older. But the tendency of preferring immediate action probably won't change, this could impact the relationship at various times regardless you're similar or opposite in the same trait.

for the latter it's natural to cause tension when you two differ in the ways to handle situation; for the former, sometimes immediate action could cause damage to both of you and in turn to the relationship indirectly. [ very similar in all the roles??? what's implication specific to partner???]

info.high: S/he thinks through before making any decision and is likely to wish the child has the same habit, unfortunately everyone is different even from the same genes; at the meant time a good parent-child could be expected thanks for her/his careful planning on family matters.
The parent would be glad that s/he plans ahead before taking any action and general do not have to worry her/him.
info.medium: S/he is averaged in terms of caution and planning, does not usually cause impact to parent-child relationship as far as this trait is concerned.
info.low: it's pleasure for parents to see their child being vibrant but at the meant time they can't stop worrying for his/her preference towards immediate action and lack of caution, this could become increasingly apparent when the child grows up.

general.high: S/he always exercises caution at work, with careful planning, and is reliable for completing tasks. People love to work with her/him.

info.high: S/he's very cautious so before you're 100% sure do not propose anything.

Who doesn't like a cautious subordinate? If the boss is alike they share the same trait or s/he complements. Generally the boss likes her/him but this alone won't lead to even closer relationship. Yet s/he may be even cautious in this and intentionally keep dsitance from the boss.

Her/his team mate loves her/him for his reliability. S/he either not answering a question or the answer is accurate and can be relied upon; they hate him too for the same reason - even if there's little doubt s/he can be over cautious sometiems and will refuse to take over the work.

general.high: cautious if scored high in Trust, ...; if score low in trust, s/he is extremely cautious in dealing with friendship(making new friends [approaching...])

info.high: Though cautious scored high in Trust, so not too hard to developer close friendship.../cautious also score low in trust, s/he is extremely cautious in dealing with friendship(making new friends [approaching...]. It'll usually need something specific that proves your genuineness before s/he will open up the mind.

info.summary: This is one of the six facets in the B5 Model. It consists the traits such as Altruism & Morality etc
info.general: This facet averages its individual traits and is generally an indication of a person's tendency to be compassionate and cooperative toward others.
info.high: Value getting along with others. They have a more optimistic view of human nature.
info.medium: medium , neutral
info.low: Value self interests over others. They are more skeptical of others' motives.

general.high: Generally, this person is easy going and good in all kinds of relationships, being compassionate to others makes the target a popular person in the social circle. If the person is also physically attractive s/he will be extremely welcome by the opposite sex and as the other half, you may sometimes find yourself jealousy

info.high: Your partner is easy going ... elaborate ... to form a even better relationship.
info.medium: Your partner is neutral in easy going.
info.low: Your partner is not easy going!

info.high: you have an easy going parent, not much control... do not abuse it.. more independent but easily out of control, be matured

children.description: Fondness for the company of others; sociability.

info.high: Find that helping others is genuinely rewarding, that doing things for others is a form of self-fulfilment rather than self-sacrifice.
info.low: More concerned with taking care of her/himself than taking time for others. Not necessarily selfish, but believing other people are capable of taking care of themselves, so only mind his or her own business. When asked, depends on other traits the person has, she/he may be actually more than willing to help.

general.high: People who score high simply feel happy and fulfilled in helping others. If you scores low in this trait, it's important to understand this. You may not agree with their efforts in helping others, but if you want them happy, support them; at the meant time watch out for people around who try to take advantage of this good nature.
general.medium-high: While in the middle of the range, this person is more towards to the higher end, i.e. s/he tends to feel fulfilled when helping others; but the tendency is subtle compared to people who scored high.
general.medium: The need for self-focused and fulfillment in helping others are similar in weights. In a relationship, this person will be more likely to spend half of the time in self-focused activities, the remaining half in devoting to the relationship. They are neutral in altruism, so they tend to give based on reciprocity in relationship, be it at work, home or social networks.
general.medium-low: The person is in the middle range but towards the lower end, i.e. they tend to believe other people can take care of themselves, though they may sometimes also feel fulfilled when helping others, yet most of the time they only mind her/his business; while they sometimes do help others, in other times they may do that on a reciprocal basis.
general.low: In a relationship, this person spends more time in self-focus activities, than spending time together, but this does not meant they aren't good partner or parents - they simply feel strong need in devoting more time in areas like self improvements or enjoyments, this becomes less apparent when they become older though.

info.high:
S/he will feel even happier when you can join her/him to help others together, at the meant time as your partner sometimes the commitment to help others may affect you, there's always a balance required to retain.

Meanwhile study has suggests altruism results in happier relationship and marriage, since your parter feel fulfilled to give in the relationship, you're very lucky! But don't take it as granted!
info.medium-high: S/he scores in the medium to high range in this trait and tends to spend more time devoting to the relationship than self focused activities, but the tendency is not huge as they do need to spend significant time focusing on themselves as well. Is this the right balance? that depends on how much you score in this trait.
info.medium: S/he tends to strike a good balance in time and effort spent between self-focused activities and devoting to the relationship, this may naturally fit well to most people's standard. If you have different standard, the key is mutual respect.
info.medium-low: S/he tends to spend more time on self-focused activities than those devoting to the relationship, but as in the medium to low range, they still spend sometime helping others. In short they need both inner towards and outer, but more on inner, so if s/he has lots of people to share this relatively small part of her/his time, then there maybe some tensions, otherwise you'll be fine.
info.low: S/he is more interested in himself or herself in a relationship, but this does not mean they aren't a good partner. She/he respects your time and efforts spent in your own activities and demands the same type of respect. If you love her/him and decides to stay in the relationship, then you first have to accept this, then show your respect when building the relationship.

info.high: As parent s/he feels even more fulfilled when helping the child. The child can get her/him to do something by simply showing how helpful s/he. Other parents may prefer to spend more time for themselves, s/he never hesitates to lend a helping hand, generally there's no issues in parent-child relationship in regards to this trait, but if the has been exploiting this good nature and spoiled, tension can start to build up when s/he decides to stop being over helpful.
info.medium: It's a natural tendency for her/him to strike a good balance between helping the child letting the child to develop dependency, at the meant time s/he may seem a little inconsistent and contradicting overtime to the child, since s/he sometimes is naturally inclined to lend more help and feel fulfilled while at other times insist the child should take care of her/himself, especially when the assistance request comes in the wrong timing. Understanding her/his position in this trait can be key to the parent-child relationship in the child's early childhood. [S/he scores in the middle but towards to the higher/lower end, (higher: altruism/ lower: egoism]
info.low: As parent s/he believes people should take care of themselves and sometimes appear to be uncaring, and this does not mean s/he doesn't love the child. If the child doesn't understand this the parent-child relationship may become unhealthy.

info.high: As an altruistic child, one of the best ways for the parents to develop relationship is to join her/him to help others, during by which they're fulfilled, the tie in the parent-child relationship will also be built.
info.medium: Being in the middle range, s/he strikes a balance between helping others and maintaining own focus activities, a good parent-child relationship can be obtained by keeping the balance accordingly in activities among family and personal.
info.low: As an egoistic child, s/he minds her/his own business and is relatively independent, requires minimum care from parents. Yet this doesn't mean s/he doesn't need love from parents, they demand love like other children do but in different ways. Showing too much care  matters may appear annoying to her/him since s/he believes s/he should be capable of taking care of things in her/his own hands, yet simply showing your support could be effective signals of caring.

general.high: This person feels fulfilled when helping colleagues, customers or business partners, and is considered very helpful in all types of work relationship.

info.high: As a boss s/he is genuine in helping subordinates, but you must understand the bottom line: you have to help your boss in the first place. For pay rise or promotion, until you have helped her/him to solve problems or improve efficiency, there's not much she/he can do to help you.
info.medium: S/he strikes a good balance between being helpful to subordinates and expecting them to complete tasks independently. If you need her/his help and you haven't bothered them in a while, it maybe a good timing to ask now.
info.low: S/he believes subordinate should be in control of matters and generally doesn't like them passing the problems back to her/him and asking for advices or help. Yet when opportunity comes when you can naturally show them you have solved numerous problems so far, then don't hesitate to that, so they are aware of how much you've been through quietly.

info.high: As a altruist subordinate s/he has good relationship with colleagues and is a good team player, and S/he would travel extra miles for work. You'd love to have such a good subordinate generally the relationship should be superb with regards to this trait.
info.medium: S/he strikes a good balance between helping others and efforts in self-focused activities, is generally a good team player and at the meant time would spend significant time in self development. Generally there's no issue in building relationship with her/him in regards to this trait.
info.low: S/he believes people should take care of themselves and may not be considered very helpful among colleagues, her/his relationship with you maybe based on reciprocity.

info.high: S/he enjoy helping team mates, if she/he is experienced and very capable then s/he is very popular in the team, generally has no issues with relationship with other team mates.
info.medium: S/he strikes a balance between helping others and spending time in self-focused work, and her/his attitude of helping team mates may appear inconsistent -- you may find her/him very helpful in one day but in the other trying to focus on her/his own work. If you understand his trait and do not keep in mind for days when s/he is less helpful, then there's no problem to getting along with her/him.
info.low: S/he prefers everyone works independently once tasks are assigned to each team mate. S/he usually does not take the initials to offer help since s/he believes people should be capable of taking care themselves. In occasions they do it may be based on reciprocity. By the same token they usually try to get the job done on the own and doesn't easily seek help, yet if you take the initiative to help and if s/he accepts it, it can be a turning point to build closer relationship with her/him.

general.high: This person feels fulfilled when helping people and is generally a welcome person in the social network.
general.low: This person is more concerned about him/herself, and believes people should and can take care of themselves. In social networks or community most people keep some distance with respect only a handful of them can become her/his close friend.

info.high: Since she/he's genuine in helping others, those who received the favor and remember will remain good friends in years to come. When this continues to accumulate, there'll be many solid relationship in the social circle, and you should be glad to be part of this.
info.medium-high:
While in the middle of the range, this person is more towards to the higher end, i.e. he tends to feel fulfilled than not when helping others; but the tendency is subtle compared to people who score high.

You may sometimes also find them inconsistent - they're helpful most of the time but at some day they appear much 'colder'. That is probably the time when they need to be in 'self-focused' mode. Once you understand their trait then you know when to avoid hitting the wall.
info.medium: This person scores in the middle, doesn't particularly love to help others but at the meant time doesn't hate it too.
info.medium-low:
The person is in the middle range but towards the lower end, i.e. they more tend to believe other people can take care of themselves, though they may sometimes also feel fulfilled when helping others, most of the time they only mind her/his business.

To get along with them you should give them space when they are not in the 'devoting' mode - they seldom are, but once they're, it's good opportunity to seek their help, both themselves and you maybe surprised to find how fulfilling it is to them, which is something they don't usually realize. This in turn could enhance your relationship.
info.low: This persons tend to spend more time in self-focused activities, and do not easily ask help too when faced with problem. In times when they do need help and if you take the initial to offer help and if they accept it, they may become your reliable friends.

info.high: Unlike the business view, here refers to potential or existing business associates who are also active in the same social network. Business relationship can be developed from friendship and vice versa.

children.description: Active and genuine concern for the welfare of others.

info.high: This person is easy to please and try to avoid confrontation, she or he adds harmony in any relationship.
info.medium: This person is neural in tendency to confrontation in a relationship, there are various tactics depends her/his role in the relationship, and the nature of the relation.
info.low: This person does not shy away from contradicting others, if you happen to have the same trait, you may find you two argue a lot.

general.low: This person tends to have stronger sense of right and wrong, this could cause unnecessary tense in your relationship sometimes. Again, understanding this trait in her/him, accepting and respecting is the key to keep the relationship in good shape.

info.high: They are easy to give in and compromise in conflicts, which makes them the best partners in harmony. But accumulation of compromising over time could cause them the feeling of losing themselves and result in unhappiness, her/his partner should be aware of this.
info.medium: S/he's neutral in tendency to confrontation, s/he attempts to insist for the way how things should be done, but is ready to compromise upon resistance.
info.low: S/he has strong opinion on ways how things should be done, and is not easy to compromise, if you also score high in this trait, to avoid tension, one has to give in, unfortunately. But this will change over time when s/he grows older in age.

info.high:
S/he will try to cooperate with the child unless the request is unreasonable. If the child can't even get along with parents like her/him the child could have serious problem in getting along with any people.

On the other hand, for a smart child, it maybe tempted to exploit the parent's tendency in the trait and take advantage of it. This could cause some tension to the parent-child relationship. Other that this the relationship should be fine as far as this trait is concerned.
info.medium: S/he strikes a pretty good balance between compromising and insisting own opinion, and generally shouldn't have too much issue as far as this trait is concerned.
info.low: As parent s/he may appear to the child to be in strict authority all the time but it's actually  natural tendency of contradicting others when s/he's in different opinion, and s/he's not necessarily unreasonable. When in conflicts, if the child has a valid point it's still possible to convince him/her; alternatively the child can try to ask her/him to respect one's own decisions or choices.

As a child s/he may appear to be rebellious but s/he actually simply has the natural tendency to confront even with authority when in different opinion. This can be good trait in critical times and the parent generally are not advised to 'teach' them to change, yet at the meant time when necessary, parent may want to help them to gradually become more considering and accommodating in a team, a social group or the larger community[improve???]

children.description: Dislike of confrontations. Responding to interpersonal conflict with a willingness to compromise.

info.high: Uncomfortable being the center of attention, yet not necessarily lacks self-confidence or self-esteem.
info.medium: medium , neutral
info.low: This person holds herself or himself in high regard and is satisfied with who s/he is.

general.high: This person is modest in all kinds of relationship.
general.low: This person shows egotism in all kinds of relationship, see each specific roles for tatics to build stronger relationship with her/him.

info.high: Being modest results in a very comfortable relationship. In addition study shows modest promotes commitment from the other party in a relationship. So despite being modest, they are actually natural winer in relationship.
info.medium: Your partner is neutral in easy going.
info.low: Your partner is egotistic. People with this trait have high standards and harsh demand on themselves for achievement. In return, their inner proud tend to believe that they deserve what you are giving to the relationship. If you do not have the opposite trait then harmony is hard to retain. But this changes with experience in life and tend to weaken when they grow older.

info.high: you have modest parents, unlike other parents, who may be the main talkers in conversations, they are more natural listeners, this makes your relationship more like friendship.
info.low:
Your parent are proud of themselves because they set high standard and work hard to achieve it, they may have similar expectation of you, this could cause some tension in the relationship especially if you have the opposite trait; at the meant you must appreciate that you may have had much less achievement without the pressure from them.

If they are wonderful but you have different traits and tend to be modest, or enjoy various aspects in life rather than achieving different sorts of success, you'd better ask them to understand that you have different personality and goals from theirs, you may succeed in getting their respect and support for your own choices in life.

info.high: You have a modest child, and study has shown that modesty promotes commitment from the other party in relationships, so there's no need to worry about them. If your child is wonderful, and you enjoy being in the lime light, then please resist the temptation to put her or him in the center of attention.

children.description: Tendency to be unassuming and play down own achievements; humility.

info.high: This person tend to think it is wrong to take advantage of others to get ahead.
info.medium: medium , neutral
info.low: Comfortable using every trick in the book to get what she/he want.

general.extra: In a love relationship between lovers, family members or friends, the connection from morality is very intricate. This can be very complex, and there're at least two aspects. One can have low morality but still deeply loves someone and can do anything for her/his lover; on the other hand, in a true love relationship, one party's low morality typically doesn't affect the other's commitments, this is especially true for mothers who love their children no matter what, the love is unconditional and low morality is certainly not part of the condition.
general.high: This person can be trusted inside or outside of the relationship, She or he has no problem in developing long term and healthy relationship since trust is almost the basis to any type of the relationship, with some exceptions.
general.low: This person would not be strict in terms of morality, this does not meant s/he does not love you. It simply means that, if telling a lie can save the relationship s/he will not hesitate to do that.

info.high: S/he has high ethical standard and can be trusted as an honest partner. Some study suggests long term relationship is more likely to develop among moral people; the impact is two-way - long term relationship is also more likely to promote morality.
info.medium:
S/he's in the middle of the range when it comes to whether one should play small tricks to get things done, and her/his behaviour in this regards is the most unpredicted. People score in the middle in this trait could be a little confused themselves too, while giving others an impression of double standard.

Situation could become complex for example s/he may have lost your trust if s/he got caught up once when being tricky, at the meant time you may find her/him genuinely believe in morality.

At times like this, there's no better solution than understanding her/his position in this trait, perhaps combining with other tratis in the facet.
info.low:
There are two cases: your partner could be tricky outside of the relationship but her/his love is genuine; her/his love is not genuine and she/he is also tricky in side of the relationship. We assume it's the first case since for the second case you should end the relationship.

For the second case this is one of the very few traits that we can't offer advice.

On one hand study shows it's more likely long term relationship develops based on morality; but morality can also be built upon long term relationship; at the meant time there are many 'tricky' people whose love are genuine and maintain long term relationship successfully. So our advice is to trust your feelings.

It's also important to point out that the tendency of walking outside of the lines has no bearing with one's moral standard. A person can be strict in morality but has low standard and vice versa. So your decision should be based more on her/his standard rather than the tendency to overlook it.

info.high:
This trait can change when people grow older, so if s/he's your parent and and just when you think s/he's old school, too strict, not flexible, s/he may have been just as comfortable as you do to cross the line a bit to get things done when s/he's young. They just don't see the need any more, perhaps 'getting things done' has less meaning now to them, and one day you may change too.

On the other hand some people were born with this trait and there's little change when they grow older. (If your parents are like that.?) In either case if the child has the opposite trait, there maybe conflicts as to how things should be handled. Just remember, in a long run, morality pays off, one way or the other!
info.medium:
From time to time there maybe conflicts and confusion internally, if handled incorrectly this could cause confusion to the child too in her/his early childhood.

At the meant time, there's potential to retain the right balance - doing the right thing most of the time yet play a couple of non-harmful tricks when necessary, and consciously or unconsciously passed to the child. This all depends on ability, different stages at life, and the child's own trait.
info.low:
S/he maybe a little tricky in times, yet may or may not want his/her child to handle things in the same way, so s/he may hide to the child when s/he's being tricky.

If s/he deliberately teaches the child to handle things in this kind of 'flexible' way, depends on the child's own trait, the child may or may not feel comfortable about it. It's also possible that the discomfort is only felt in years later. when the child grows much older or matured, when knowing her/himself much more.

info.high: S/he's a moral child of whom parents should be proud. Depends on the parent's own trait, the parents may or may not agree with her/him. If you're the parent and being opposite in the trait, please just be reminded that morality always wins in the long run!
info.medium: S/he could be very confused when in the grey areas, this is when s/he may very much in need of parent's guidance or advise. If the parent can explain and clear the confusion it can become a base of solid parent-child relationship in the years to come. It's not an easy job when the situation is in a grey area, but a good starting point will be examining her/his trait.
info.low: Your child feels comfortable to cross the line in order to get things done, this usually won't change over a long period of time or until something big happens in life. Yet raising the moral standard will help since with different standard, crossing the line would mean different matters such as jaywalking or temporary embezzlement.

info.low: S/he place own interest before anything, so good relationship will not help your sales. In stead, focus on the real sales stuffs: understand what problem is he facing with, what are the paint points, how your products or service can eliminate the paint points or meets his demands, how are you doing compared to your competitors etc.

info.high: S/he may want to get your order very much, but at the meant time, if you feel their genuineness in helping you, that means s/he  truly believe the service and product can help you; if you don't then chance is that s/he her/himself does not think the product or service can help, s/he's purely trying to make a sales.
info.medium:
You usually do not need to care about the relationship unless s/he is a large upstream supplier whose can significantly affect your business if the supply is not steady.

For half of the time s/he feels fulfilled when s/he's able to help you. So exaggerating a little about how important their supply will not hurt.
info.low: S/he place own interest before anything, so will try to push and get your order with little regards to whether you really need the product or service.; if provider..., that need good relationship, try convincing her/him from him/her's perspective. (For example? ...)

children.description: Tendency to see need for pretense or manipulation when dealing with others and are therefore whether is candid, frank, and genuine. Impact to relationship from this trait is hard to predict - there is an intricate and complex connection between morality and personal relationships.

info.high: This person feels what others feel and are compassionate toward them.
info.medium: medium , neutral
info.low: This person thinks people should generally rely more on themselves than on others.

general.high: This person makes others feel beloved and cared about in any type of relationship, nevertheless there're various tactics to strengthen the relationship even further in different type of relationship.
general.low: This person sometimes appears a bit uncaring in the relationship but in fact s/he only believes that people can take care of themselves. There are various tactics in different types of relationship.

info.high:
Sympathy make them the best lovers, but you may not like everyone that your partner is sympathetic towards, this maybe his/her ex, maybe his/her spoiled sister or one of the close friends who takes advantage of his/her good nature, sometimes this could cause a bit tense but aren't you lucky having a partner who would feel what you feel!

If you have made the same mistakes many times but s/he still gives you one more chance, only because she felt what you felt last time when you promised her/him that you wouldn't do that again. Try to recall how you felt? you may feel regret, guilty or fear in losing her/him? that's exactly how she felt too and that's why s/he gave you again one more chance. Please do not abuse her chance!
info.medium: Your partner is neutral in easy going.
info.low: Your partner is not sympathetic but this does not mean they're not a great lover. Yet if one day they decide to leave, no matter how good you were, they would not come back, you will find them almost cold blooded - that's only because they are low in this trait, and they don't feel much other feel. They may understand why and how others feel, but they simply can't feel the same.

info.high: You have an sympathetic parent, they may appear soft hearted sometimes but that's only because they feel what you feel, that does not mean they're not strong. It's more likely to develop closer relationship with parents who scores higher in this trait.
info.low:
Your parents may seem harsh from time to time, because even they understand your feeling perfectly they simply do not feel the same, but this does not mean they don't love you, they were just born with this trait.

At the meant time, they're less likely to spoil you. To build strong relationship with parents of this trait requires better communication, mutual understanding and respect.

info.high: You have an sympathetic child, they can be your best friends and share your feelings in family hard time. Yet at time you may wish them become tougher, but their could be much stronger than they appear to be, that may not be apparent until tough time arrives. They feel others feel but it doesn't mean they're soft.

children.description: Attitude of compassion for others; kindness.

info.high: This person believes the best of others and trust people easily.
info.medium: medium , neutral
info.low: This person is wary of other people's intentions and do not trust easily

general.high: Almost everyone likes this person in any types of relationship since s/he views people and the world all as innocent.
general.low: It's not easy to develop deep relationship with this person in all types of relationship since s/he is skeptical about others' motives.

info.high: Your partner tend to trust people easily so it's easy to build the trust, and trust is the key to any relationship. If you have the opposite trait you maybe amazed how simple and innocent the world is through her/his eyes, or you may constantly try to teach her/him not to trust people. If it's the latter case and if it's generating tense, you may consider stop doing that, in stead let them keep their way of interaction with the world and other people, and let them learn with their own pace.
info.medium: Your partner is neutral in easy going.
info.low:
Your partner is not easy to trust people so it will take extra efforts and time before the trust can be built; even after the trust is built s/he may easily become skeptical again. If you love her/him please accept this, it's not her/his intention not to trust you this is simply the trait inside of her/him.

In sensible times, such as when there's problem in the relationship, they can be skeptical about almost anything, so the best way is to be honest and straight to them. Being honest itself could first appear suspicious to them! but they are usually intelligent people and will quickly figure out that you're genuine.

Why they are intelligent people? Their minds do lots of calculation exercises so how dumb they can be?

info.high: Your parent tend to trust you unless you have repeatedly abused their trust. Trusting is rare nowadays, so when given, that's always the recipient's choice whether value that or abuse it. In a long run everyone knows what's the sequence of each choice, it's just a matter of doing it or not.

Your child trust you, in fact s/he trust almost anyone until they find out people misuse her/his trust. But this nature does not change easily so soon s/he may trust a new friend again after brief 'evaluating'.

Trust is the heart of any good relationship. It's advisable to encourage your child to continue to trust people but at the meant time defer the trust and enhance the ability to see through people's ingenuity.
info.low:
Your child does not trust people easily, you maybe one of the few exceptions. If they don't trust you too, there must have been incidents which had directly or indirectly help them to develop this trait, because this trait can start to exist in gene, leading to various degrees of tendency on born, but early childhood's experience plays a crucial role in developing the trait too.

So if your child does not trust you it maybe a good opportunity to work out what has happened and how the trust can be rebuilt; if you can successfully restore her/his trust to you then there's a good chance s/he will become more willing to trust other people as well.

Agreeableness.description:
Higher: Value getting along with others. They have a more optimistic view of human nature.
Lower: Value self interests over others. They are more skeptical of others' motives.
Agreeableness.summary: This facet averages its individual traits and is generally an indication of a person's tendency to be compassionate and cooperative toward others.

general.high: Since this person can get along well with almost anyone, it's generally not difficult to build good relationship with, at home, work or social network, yet precisely because she or he appears to be good to everyone, depends on each individual trait she or he posses, there are various tactics to enhance the relationship further.
general.medium-high: This person scores in the medium range but towards the higher (lower) end; (extract to view!).So they are generally easy going but not all the time. Or: So they are not the most easy going type but they score the 2nd. Compared to the people score in the high range, they need more time for themselves. [People score in the same range in the facet could be very different as they could be completely opposite in one or two traits that belong to the same facet] [ extracted to general info / instructions, yet context-related located..So you need to pay special attention to those traits that they score low. [see each trait for details][all from comparative perspective  the scores & ranges](or extracted to all med rangers)
general.medium: This person score in the middle so they really tend to strike a very well balance between focusing on themselves and paying attention to others. Yet it's not simple math of devoting 50% of the time, instead they score differently in each trait that belong to this facet. For example two person both score 50 for this facet but they could score 90 in 3 of the traits while the other score 10 in the same 3 traits yet both score an average of 50 for the 6 traits in this facet. Check out analysis details of this person in each of the traits below.
general.medium-low: This person scores in the medium range but towards the higher (lower) end; (extract to view!). So they are generally not easy going but not all the time, theyre the most confusing type of person since they can be charming and warm today but ignoring and cold the next. If you understand which trait they score high and which low then you may understand them better.
general.low: This person tend to focus on her/himself more and is generally skeptical to other's motives, so it's challenging to build relationship with them. Yet there're a couple of traits that belong to the facet which they still score reasonably high, and these traits can be braking points or turning points for laying the foundation from which it should be much easier to continue building the relationship.

Agreeableness.perspective: This analysis is based on the perspective of relationship building, you can change perspective from the drop down menu in the navigation bar.

info.high: Value getting along with others. They have a more optimistic view of human nature.
info.medium: medium , neutral
info.low: Value self interests over others. They are more skeptical of others' motives.

general.high: Generally, this person is easy going and good in all kinds of relationships, being compassionate to others makes the target a popular person in the social circle. If the person is also physically attractive s/he will be extremely welcome by the opposite sex and as the other half, you may sometimes find yourself jealousy

info.high: Your partner is easy going ... elaborate ... to form a even better relationship.
info.medium: Your partner is neutral in easy going.
info.low: Your partner is not easy going!

info.high: you have an easy going parent, not much control... do not abuse it.. more independent but easily out of control, be matured
You have an easy going child, they get along well with their own friends and don't rely on you too much; still your company; also watch out what kind of friends they hand around.

general.high: This person is easy going and forms good relationship with colleagues, customers or business partners.

info.high: You have an easy going boss.
You have an easy going subordinate.
You have an easy going team mate.
The target is an easy going friend

general.high: She/he feels fulfilled when helping people and is generally considered a helpful person in the business network.
general.medium: From time to time, there can be some inner conflicts between helping you and getting straight to business.
general.low: S/he places own interest beyond anything else, good relationship is not too vital, depends on the role s/he is in, so try to focus on business.

info.high: If your product or service matches other competitors, then telling her/him how desperately you need the order, and the reasons why this order will help your situation could help you to get the deal.
info.medium: S/he may be having some inner conflicts if you did a good job in showing how helpful it'd be to have her/his order. There's always chance that S/he is tempted to place the order as helping you could fulfil her/himself too. Yet if s/he's in the egoism mood, then s/he will be very much focus on business.
info.low: S/he place own interest before anything, so good relationship will not help your sales. In stead, focus on the real sales stuffs: understand what problem is he facing with, what are the paint points, how your products or service can eliminate the paint points or meets his demands, how are you doing compared to your competitors etc.

info.high: S/he may want to get your order very much, but at the meant time, if you feel their genuineness in helping you, that means s/he  truly believe the service and product can help you; if you don't then chance is that s/he her/himself does not think the product or service can help, s/he's purely trying to make a sales.
info.medium:
You usually do not need to care about the relationship unless s/he is a large upstream supplier whose can significantly affect your business if the supply is not steady.

For half of the time s/he feels fulfilled when s/he's able to help you. So exaggerating a little about how important their supply will not hurt.
info.low: S/he place own interest before anything, so will try to push and get your order with little regards to whether you really need the product or service.; if provider..., that need good relationship, try convincing her/him from him/her's perspective. (For example? ...)

info.high: S/he may want to get your order very much, but at the meant time, if you feel their genuineness in helping you, that means s/he  truly believe the service and product can help you; if you don't then chance is that s/he her/himself does not think the product or service can help, s/he's purely trying to make a sales.
info.medium:
You usually do not need to care about the relationship unless s/he is a large upstream supplier whose can significantly affect your business if the supply is not steady.

For half of the time s/he feels fulfilled when s/he's able to help you. So exaggerating a little about how important their supply will not hurt.
info.low: S/he place own interest before anything, so will try to push and get your order with little regards to whether you really need the product or service.; if provider..., that need good relationship, try convincing her/him from him/her's perspective. (For example? ...)

children.description: Preserving and enhancing the welfare of those with whom one is in frequent personal contact.
